column6: **Sale until Sept. 1: 2ND NIGHT $200/3RD $175\nRemodeled farmhouse from 1900. Style like “Fixer Upper” with original shiplap walls. Kitchen, laundry, large dining, 2 full baths, sleeps 9. Master/king bed, rustic bunkroom/two double bunks & twin. Queen-sized Murphy bed. \nNo TV or internet. Great view of private lake. Weather/availability permitting--fishing, hunting, campfire, ranch tours, feeding animals on the ranch--cows, goats & pigs. 20 mins to McLane Baylor Stadium & Magnolia Market.
column9: Fabulous Turn of the Century Farmhouse on Ranch
